source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_00<tab>Emeloth is expecting a call on her linkpearl any moment now.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_00<tab>ラールガーズリーチのエメロスは、ある人物からの連絡を待っているようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_01<tab>No sooner do you begin conversing with Emeloth than she receives a call on her linkpearl from Marcel. It appears the apprentices' handiwork has been well received in Ul'dah, and Marcel would have them come to Ul'dah to meet with clients. Bear the good tidings to your students, who have gathered by Chakra Falls to the north.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_01<tab>エメロスと話した。徒弟たちの仕事が認められ、冒険者の指南は早くも成果を収めつつあるようだ。ラールガーズリーチのチャクラ大滝付近にいる「ジャ・ケビカ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_02<tab>Your apprentices are ecstatic to learn that their crafting skills have met with approval. They go on to reveal that they wish to repay the sultana's kindness, but are struggling to determine what manner of item would make for a suitable tribute. J'khebica proposes consulting Marcel on the matter, and begs you to put in a word on their behalf when they travel to Ul'dah for the meeting.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_02<tab>ジャ・ケビカと話し、ウルダハのナナモ女王に恩返しをしたいという相談を受けた。ウルダハの宝飾店「エシュテム」にいる「マルセル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_03<tab>Though unable to provide an insight into a tribute, Marcel shares with you a rumor that a disguised Nanamo has been frequenting a certain shop. If you can but observe her visiting the shop in question, you may be able to discover the object of her fancy. This is good enough for J'khebica, who rushes off to investigate the rumor on Sapphire Avenue with her fellow apprentices. Join them there and be on hand to identify the sultana should she make an appearance.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_03<tab>マルセルと話した。ウルダハのサファイアアベニュー国際市場にいる「ジャ・ケビカ」「ウィド」「ハル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_04<tab>Your apprentices have managed to learn that the shop Nanamo frequents is a sundry goods store situated opposite the arms vendor Jealous Juggernaut. All that remains, then, is to plant yourself at a suitable spot and play the waiting game.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_04<tab>徒弟たちと話した。ナナモ女王に似たお嬢様が、お忍びでよく訪れる場所があるという。サファイアアベニュー国際市場の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA38C01 /var>」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_05<tab>After a short while standing watch, a maiden not unlike Nanamo appears at the shop accompanied by a man not unlike Papashan. Their conversation reveals that Nanamo is extremely smitten with an orchestrion on display there, but it is too big to fit in her bedchamber. With that, the tribute is decided: an elegant and compact orchestrion. Join your apprentices back at Rhalgr's and report all that has come to pass to Emeloth.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_05<tab>ナナモ女王は、小さくて可愛いオーケストリオンを欲しがっていることがわかった。ラールガーズリーチへと戻り、「エメロス」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_06<tab>While Emeloth appreciates the apprentices' enthusiasm, she believes that they are not quite ready to make an orchestrion. To prepare them for the challenge, she proposes having them practice by crafting a tabletop chronometer, a similarly complex apparatus, and it falls to you once more to craft a sample for your apprentices.

※In the event you lose the materials or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Kanchana.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_06<tab>複雑な機械製作に初めて挑む徒弟たちのために、お手本となるクロノメーターを作ることになった。「<var 28 ((Item)) F245F101 /var>」をもとに「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F245F201 /var>」を製作し、ラールガーズリーチの「エメロス」に納品しよう。

※「<var 28 ((Item)) F245F101 /var>」を失った場合は、カンチャナに話しかけましょう。材料を入手し、再挑戦が可能になります。

source:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_07<tab>Your tabletop chronometer impresses Emeloth to no end and leaves your apprentices in awe of your skills yet again. As they go about honing their skills for the task ahead, see to it that you do not neglect your own, for yours are the hands that shape these young goldsmiths.

※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Emeloth upon reaching level 70.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_SEQ_07<tab>エメロスに納品した。大きな目標ができて、徒弟たちのやる気も大いに増したようだ。彼らのよき師範としてアラミゴの将来に貢献すべく、彫金師としての腕前を洗練させていこう。

※彫金師のレベルが70以上になると、ラールガーズリーチのエメロスから、次の彫金師クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_00<tab>Speak with J'khebica.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_00<tab>ジャ・ケビカと話す

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Marcel in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_01<tab>ウルダハのマルセルと話す

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_02<tab>Speak with J'khebica.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_02<tab>ジャ・ケビカと話す

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wido.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_03<tab>ウィドと話す

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Hal.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_04<tab>ハルと話す

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_05<tab>Wait at the designated location.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_05<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA38C01 /var>で待機

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Emeloth at Rhalgr's Reach.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_06<tab>ラールガーズリーチのエメロスと話す

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_07<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a sample chronometer <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the sample chronometer <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Emeloth)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_TODO_07<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 クラスクエスト：<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F245F201 /var>を製作)) ((エメロスに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F245F201 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_030<tab>Schoolmaster, I trust you've been keeping well. It pleases me to say that our apprentices are making sound progress. Such is their dedication, they've even formed a study group of their own volition.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_030<tab>ごきげんよう。
徒弟さんたちは近ごろ、めきめきと腕を上げているようですの。
自主的に勉強会を始めたりと、やる気も旺盛で……。

source:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_031<tab>Pray excuse me a moment.
...Ah, Master Marcel, good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you. ...Truly!? We are in your debt!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_031<tab>失礼…………少々、お待ちを。
おや、マルセルさん…………なんですって、本当ですの！？
……わざわざ、ありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_032<tab>You will recall that I have been looking for willing outlets for our apprentices' handiwork. To that end, I sent some samples to Master Marcel to present to merchants.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_032<tab>先だって、徒弟さんたちの作った品を、
宝飾店「エシュテム」のマルセルさんにお送りしたのですが……
そのお返事をいただきましたの。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_033<tab>Well, that was Master Marcel reporting on the results, and it seems the samples were very well received! No few outlets have expressed their interest, with some willing to stock our wares on a trial basis.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_033<tab>ほかの宝飾商の方々に見せてみたところ、なかなかの好評で、
いくつか引き合いが来ているそうですの！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_034<tab>Though it's low volume still, orders have already come in, and Master Marcel asks that the apprentices come to Eshtaime's for a meeting with the clients. To reach this stage in so short a time is a tremendous achievement, and they may rightly feel proud.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_034<tab>試験的に置いてくださる店もあるということで、
小口ながら、さっそくご注文もいただきましたの。
いちどウルダハで、直接打ち合わせをしたいとのこと……！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_035<tab>Speaking of the apprenticesss, they shall be glad for the tidingsss. Mayhap the ssschoolmaster would care to be the bearer?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_035<tab>シュー……よい報せは、師範から伝えてもらったほうが、
徒弟たちも喜ぶのではないかしら？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_036<tab>There is no denying the news would be sweeter coming from you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Might I trouble you to tell them?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_036<tab>わたくしからも、ぜひお願いします。
それにしても、こんなに早く注文をいただけるなんて。
……彼らの成長ぶりには、驚くばかりですね。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_037<tab>You will find them gathered by Chakra Falls to the north. Engaging in some furtive enterprissse, if I might add.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_037<tab>シュー……あの子たちなら「チャクラ大滝」の近くにいたわ。
そういえば何か、ひそひそ話をしてたみたいだけど……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_040<tab>The news would be sweeter coming from you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Please go and tell our apprentices.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_040<tab>徒弟さんたちの品が、
ウルダハのお店に置いてもらえることになりましたの。
師範の口から、お伝えくださいますか？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_050<tab>You will find the apprenticesss gathered by Chakra Falls to the north, whissspering up a storm.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_050<tab>シュー……あの子たちなら「チャクラ大滝」の近くにいたわ。
そういえば何か、ひそひそ話をしてたみたいだけど……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_060<tab>Can't you see we're─ Ch-Chief!? H-How did you know we was here?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_060<tab>悪いな、いまちょっと手が離せな……って、師範じゃねえか！？
何でここがわかったんだ……？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_070<tab>Uwaaah! W-We ain't doin' nothin' suspicious, I swear!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_070<tab>あれ…………し、師範！？
な、何もやましいことはしてないよ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_080<tab>Ah, yes, I had the pleasure of inspecting your apprentices' works, and I must say they surpassed all my expectations.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_080<tab>クラウンジェム工房の徒弟がたによる作品、拝見いたしました。
驚くべき出来ばえで、彼らの成長に舌を巻いたしだいです。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_081<tab>To be sure, they are not of a quality to grace Eshtaime's shelves, but nor will they look amiss at your average shop.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_081<tab>「エシュテム」であつかうような高級品ではございませんが、
普及品をあつかっているお店では、
立派に商品として通用することでしょう。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_120<tab>S-Schoolmaster <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>!? What are you doing─ I-I mean, what can we do for you!?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_120<tab>え……師範…………何でここに！？
……じゃなくて、何か御用っすか？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_121<tab>What? Did I hear you right and you just told us we've received <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> orders from <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> clients!?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_121<tab>えー！
あたしたちに宝飾店から注文っす！？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_122<tab>Huh, an' there I thought we was years away from makin' sellable stuff.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_122<tab>すげえ……何年も先だと思ってたのに。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_123<tab>It's all thanks to you an' Miss Emeloth! We'll put out our best work an' make you proud, you'll see!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_123<tab>師範の指導のおかげだよ……ありがとう！
おいらたち、がんばるよ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_124<tab>Um, sooo...you're probably wondering why we're gathered like this and talking secret talk. You see, we want to do something to show our gratitude to the sultana for granting us this opportunity to become goldsmiths and contribute to Ala Mhigo's future.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_124<tab>実は、ここに集まってたわけっすけど……
母上の形見の宝冠まで差しだしてくれた、
ナナモ様へのお礼を考えてたっす。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_125<tab>Aye, she even sacrificed her mother's crown. An' seein' as our wares're now fit for the market, it's time we repaid her kindness.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_125<tab>オレたちもとうとう、仕事をもらえるようになったんだから、
恩返しするなら、いまだよな！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_126<tab>Problem is we can't decide how to go about it, what to give her. We was thinkin' maybe we could use the crown's remainin' gems to make somethin', but beyond that...
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_126<tab>でも、何を贈ったら喜ばれるか、わからなくて悩んでたんだよ。
残った宝冠の石で、別の何かを作るのがいいよねって、
そこまでは、みんなで決めたんだけど……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_127<tab>Oh, I've an idea! The meeting with the clients will take place at Eshtaime's and Master Marcel will be on hand, am I right?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_127<tab>…………そうだ、師範！
マルセルさんのとこで打ち合わせするってことは、
あたしたち、ウルダハに寄らなきゃいけないはずっすよね？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_128<tab>Well, if anyone knows a suitable tribute it would be him, so perhaps we could consult him on it while we're there and it would give us heart if you were present as well.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_128<tab>そのとき、お返しのことも相談しようと思うっす。
あの人なら、ナナモ様の好みとかも知ってそうだし！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_129<tab>Yeah, what she said. We'd feel a lot better havin' you with us.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_129<tab>そうだね……できれば師範も顔を出して、
「マルセル」さんにひとこと添えてもらえるとうれしいな。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_130<tab>Anyway, we'd best be off! C'mon, you two, we've got some orders to receive!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_130<tab>クラウンジェム工房としての初仕事だよ。
ふたりとも、がんばろう！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_150<tab>The apprentices departed for Ul'dah in high spirits. Ere they left, they told me their plan of a tribute for Her Grace.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_150<tab>徒弟さんたちは、さっそくウルダハへ向かいました。
とても喜んでおりましたよ……！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_151<tab>'Tis a fine idea, and I pray that your meeting with Master Marcel will provide some insights.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_151<tab>あの子たち、ナナモ陛下に恩返しの品を贈るつもりらしいですね。
打ち合わせのとき、マルセルさんに相談したいそうで。
師範からも口添えしていただければ、心強いと思いますの。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_160<tab>So the young onesss were simply discussing a tribute for the sssultana. That is a good thing, unlike some of the other possibilitiesss I entertained.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_160<tab>シュー……徒弟たちは、ナナモ様への恩返しの相談をしていたのね。
聞いちゃいけない話かと思って、わくわく……
いえ、あらぬ妄想をしてしまったわ。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_170<tab>Schoolmaster <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, thank you ever so much for coming! We've already spoken with our clients and Wido and Hal have since gone off to the markets to procure supplies, but we can ask Master Marcel about the you-know-what whenever you're ready.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_170<tab>師範……来てくれたっすね、ありがとっす！
ウィドとハルは、マーケットで材料を仕入れてるトコっす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_210<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, I am pleased to report that the meeting went smoothly and the clients left feeling confident. Now then, your apprentices say you have a consultation for me?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_210<tab>ようこそ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>様。
発注元と徒弟様との打ち合わせは、つつがなく終わりました。
で……徒弟様より、何やら私にご相談とか……？

source:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_211<tab>Ho, a tribute for the sultana, and one which makes use of the gems from her lady mother's crown! An inspired idea!
...Alas, I have none of mine own to offer; naught likely is coming to mind.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_211<tab>ナナモ様に、恩返しの品を贈りたいと？
なるほど、宝冠の石を使うというのは素晴らしい発想ですね！
ただ……私もぴったりの品が思いつきません。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_212<tab>As I'm sure you will appreciate, I am honor-bound to protect my patrons' confidentiality...but it should not infringe upon my code of conduct to share with you such rumors as are commonly heard in town.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_212<tab>また、顧客の秘密は口にしかねる立場でもあるのですが……
街で耳にした噂話なら、話してもさしつかえないでしょう。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_213<tab>If the whispers are to be believed, a maiden who shares an uncanny resemblance to the sultana has been observed frequenting a certain shop. If the maiden in question is in fact Her Grace, it may well be that something has taken her fancy. And that something may offer an answer to your question.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_213<tab>……近ごろ、サファイアアベニュー国際市場にて、
陛下に似た可憐なお嬢様が、よく足を運ばれる店があるとか。
その方が本当にナナモ陛下ならば、お探しの品があるのやも。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_214<tab>You've seen the sultana in disguise on a number of occasions, I believe. You ought to be able to recognize her easily enough.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_214<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>様はすでに、
ナナモ陛下のお忍びのお姿を、ご覧になっておりますね？
あなた様ならば、ご本人かどうか、おわかりではないかと。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_215<tab>Well, this all sounds promising and it just so happens Hal and Wido are at Sapphire Avenue Exchange so I'll fetch them and we'll investigate the rumor together!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_215<tab>……調べてみる価値はあるっすね！
ちょうどウィドとハルが、マーケットで材料の仕入れ中なんで、
いっしょに噂を確かめてみるっす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_216<tab>Once we've got a name for the shop, we'll lie in wait for the sultana and we'll need you to be on hand to identify her. See you in a bit, Schoolmaster─and thank you for your kind help, Master Marcel!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_216<tab>師範には、本当のナナモ様かどうかの確認をお願いしたいっす！
で、どの店かわかったら、ナナモ様を待ち伏せするっす！
マルセルさん、ありがとっす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_250<tab>Well do I recall the time you journeyed all the way to the Sea of Clouds for the sake of your patron─a testament to your surpassing dedication.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_250<tab>かつて<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>様も、
お客様にご満足いただける品を製作するために、
はるばるアバラシア雲海まで出向かれたことがございましたね。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_251<tab>Seeing your apprentices go to such lengths for their own patron, I daresay that dedication has filtered through to them.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_251<tab>恩返しの品に懸ける、徒弟がたの熱意も、
日ごろからの師範のご指導のたまものでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_270<tab>Schoolmaster, a short while ago there was a sighting of a maiden who looks not unlike Her Grace accompanied by a person who looks not unlike an old man.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_270<tab>師範、ご協力感謝っす！
……何とさっき、ナナモ様っぽいと言えなくもないお嬢様が、
じいっぽい人を連れて歩いてるのを、目撃したって噂を聞いたっす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_271<tab>It's secondhand information, to be sure, but if it's true it's not unlike a golden chance and we just need to find out what this shop is that the sultana visits.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_271<tab>「……っぽい」ばっかりで信用ならんっすけど、
仮に本当なら、いまがチャンスっぽいっす！
場所さえハッキリすれば、待ち伏せできるっすけど……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_280<tab>Sorry for makin' you run around with us like this, Chief. But it won't take much longer, I promise─we've got good info on the shop what's mentioned in the rumors.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_280<tab>師範にこんなことまでつきあわせちゃって、何だか悪いな……。
そのかわり、ナナモ様似のお嬢様に関する、
とっときの情報をつかんだんだ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_281<tab>It's a sundry goods store opposite an arms vendor, an' there's only so many of those on Sapphire Avenue.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_281<tab>お嬢様がよく訪れるのは、武具屋の向かいの「雑貨屋」って噂だ。
サファイアアベニューの雑貨屋っつーと、ひとつしかない。
待ち伏せするなら、そのあたりがよさそうだぜ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_290<tab>No time for supplies, we've got the sultana to find. You'll be pleased to hear I've narrowed down the arms vendor. It's a place owned by one Jealous Juggernaut.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_290<tab>材料の仕入れは中断して、聞き込みしてみたよ！
で……どうも、例の噂の出どころは、
武具屋の「ジェラス・ジャガノート」さんらしいんだ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_291<tab>Which means the sultana's favored shop's just across the way. Keep watch there long enough, an' she's bound to appear!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_291<tab>だったら、ナナモ様らしきお嬢様が訪れるのも近くの店だろうから、
武具屋さんの物陰から、こっそり見てれば……！
おいらは、ほかのふたりにも連絡しておくよ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_330<tab>A short while ago there was a sighting of a maiden who looks not unlike Her Grace accompanied by a person who looks not unlike an old man, and we just need to find out where they're going.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_330<tab>近くをいま、ナナモ様っぽいと言えなくもないお嬢様が、
じいっぽい人を連れて歩いてるらしいっす！
場所さえ特定できれば、見つけられるっぽいっす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_340<tab>The place the sultana frequents, it's a sundry goods store opposite an arms vendor. There's only so many of those on Sapphire Avenue.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_340<tab>お嬢様がよく訪れるのは、武具屋の向かいの「雑貨屋」って噂だ。
サファイアアベニューの雑貨屋っつーと、ひとつしかない。
待ち伏せするなら、そのあたりがよさそうだぜ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_350<tab>The sultana's favored shop's across from Jealous Juggernaut's place. Keep watch there long enough, an' she's bound to appear!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_350<tab>噂の出どころは武具屋の「ジェラス・ジャガノート」さん！
物陰から見てれば、ナナモ様が現れるかもしれないよ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_360<tab>Based on Wido and Hal's information, this is where the sultana-esque maiden appears...
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_360<tab>先にいらっしゃってたとは、さすがっす！
ウィドとハルの情報によると、ここで待ち伏せれば、
ナナモ様らしき謎のお嬢様が……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_361<tab><gasp> Look!
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_361<tab>見てくださいっす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_PAPASHAN_000_362<tab>(-Papashan-esque Man-)To come and see this orchestrion fairly every day... You truly are taken by it, Lady Lilira.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_PAPASHAN_000_362<tab>(-見覚えのある付き人-)また、そのオーケストリオンの前でお悩みですか。
リリラお嬢様……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_NANAMOULNAMO_000_363<tab>(-Nanamo-esque Maiden-)Oh, it is perfect in all ways...save for its size. Would that it were small enough to fit in my bedchamber. <sigh> Does an elegant and compact orchestrion not exist?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_NANAMOULNAMO_000_363<tab>(-見覚えのあるお嬢様-)とてもよい品だが、わら……わたくしの寝室には、大きさがな。
もう少し小さくて、可憐な品はないものか……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_PAPASHAN_000_364<tab>(-Papashan-esque Man-)Such an item would suit my lady very well indeed, but I fear it will prove elusive to find even in our great city.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_PAPASHAN_000_364<tab>(-見覚えのある付き人-)お嬢様のような、可愛らしいお姿のオーケストリオン……
かようなわがままに応えうる品が、ウルダハにありますかな？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_365<tab>S-Schoolmaster, was that...was that who I think it is?
target: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_365<tab>師範…………いまのって、もしかして……！？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_100_365<tab>And she desires an elegant and compact orchestrion, Byregot be praised!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_100_365<tab>やっぱり、ナナモ様だったんですね！
たしか、小さくて可憐なオーケストリオンが欲しいって……
贈りものは、それで決定っす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_366<tab>Now that we know what to make, we must back to Rhalgr's Reach so you can get to work right away and needless to say we'll be needing your help. Oh, we ought to say our thanks to Master Marcel again, but me and the others can take care of that so please go on ahead.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_366<tab>さっそく工房へ……「ラールガーズリーチ」へ戻りましょう！
師範にも、いろいろアドバイスいただきたいっす。
マルセルさんには、あたしたちからお礼を言っておくっす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_400<tab>Is it true that you were ssstalking the sssultana all over Ul'dah? ...No? Then perhapsss I misheard.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_400<tab>シュー……ナナモ様の好みを調べるために、
ウルダハで、女王陛下をつけまわしてたんですって？
あら、違うの……聞き違いかしら？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_410<tab>Your apprentices paid me a very excited visit earlier. I'm pleased to learn that my information proved useful and you have settled on a gift for the sultana.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_MARCEL_000_410<tab>ナナモ陛下への献上品が決まったと、
徒弟がたからご報告がございました……！
よい品を贈ることができそうで、何よりでございます。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_420<tab>We're truly grateful for your help in finding out what Her Grace desires and we're ready when you are to begin work on the orchestrion!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_420<tab>師範、ウルダハではありがとっす！
いますぐナナモ様へのお返しを作りたくって、
やる気がみなぎってきたっす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_430<tab>You'd think the sultana would have the run o' her own country, but I guess it ain't that simple.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_430<tab>ナナモ様って、お忍びで外出することもあるんだな……。
いつも王宮にいるものだと思ってたから、びっくりしたぜ。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_440<tab>S-Schoolmaster! Is it true!? The sultana's on her way here <var 1A 02 /var>right now<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_440<tab>師範、大変だよ！
ナナモ様が、お忍びでラールガーズリーチまで来るらしいって、
兄貴が言ってたんだ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_441<tab>...She isn't? B-But Wido said─ Oh, godsdammit, not again!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_441<tab>……あれ？
もしかしておいら、また、兄貴にだまされてる……？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_480<tab>Our apprentices have told me all. They wish to present Her Grace with an elegant and compact orchestrion. 'Tis a fine choice for a tribute, and made finer still with the gems from her lady mother's crown.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_480<tab>……徒弟さんたちから、話は伺いましたの。
女王陛下への恩返しには、可憐なオーケストリオンを製作したいと。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_481<tab>While large machines fashioned by carpenters are the norm, I believe it is well within the realm of possibility to produce a miniaturized version with our goldsmithing techniques.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_481<tab>木工師による大型のオーケストリオンも人気ですが、
彫金の繊細な技術を活かした、卓上型の品も製作可能かと。
そこに宝冠の石をあしらうとなれば、献上品として申し分なしです！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_100_481<tab>But by our techniques, I mean yours and mine, Schoolmaster. Though our apprentices have become capable enough to fill the odd order, they yet lack the skill needed to craft precision instruments, and orchestrions demand no small degree of precision.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_100_481<tab>ただ……
仕事も舞い込みはじめたとはいえ、彼らはまだ駆けだし。
オーケストリオンのような精密な機械に挑むには、経験不足です。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_482<tab>But seeing as they are determined, it falls to us to prepare them for the challenge. To that end, I've a mind to test them on a similarly complex apparatus: a tabletop chronometer.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_482<tab>そこで……徒弟さんたちにはまず、
複雑な、機械仕掛けの品を製作させたい、と思いますの。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_483<tab>From past experience, rather than being taken by the hand, I believe our apprentices learn best by following your example. And so I would ask that you perform another demonstration.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_483<tab>これまでの過程を見るに、わたくしが教えるより、
師範のお手本を見せるほうが、大きな成長が見込めそうです。
……今回も、師範に模範演技をご披露いただけませんか？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_484<tab>Pray begin whenever you are ready, Schoolmaster, and let Kanchana know if you have need of additional materials.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_484<tab>お手本として卓上型のクロノメーター……
いわゆる置き時計の製作をお願いしたいと思いますの。
もちろん必要な部材は、こちらでご用意いたします。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_500<tab>So we're to practice by making a chronometer? Whatever you and Miss Emeloth think best, of course, and of course we'll do our best!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_500<tab>まずはクロノメーターの製作からっす……？
わかったっす、がんばってみるっす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_510<tab>If an orchestrion's as hard as you say, makes sense to cut our teeth on a chronometer first. Bring it on, Chief!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_WIDO_000_510<tab>いきなりオーケストリオンを作るより、
クロノメーターで技術を磨けってことか……。
よし、やってやるぜ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_520<tab>Feels like only yesterday I was barely able to make a ring, but now I'm about to make a clock. I couldn't have made it this far without you an' Miss Emeloth.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_HAL_000_520<tab>自分の手で、時計やオーケストリオンを作ることになるなんて、
少し前には考えられなかったよ。
師範に教えてもらえて、本当によかった……！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_530<tab>Should you lack componentsss for the chronometer, do not hesssitate to tell me.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_530<tab>シュー……クロノメーターに使う部品が、
足りないときは、私が用意するわ。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_540<tab>Sssuch a fine chronometer you have made. Emeloth is sssure to be impressed.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_KANCHANA_000_540<tab>シュー……クロノメーターは、もう、完成しているんじゃないの？
エメロスに見せれば、喜ぶと思うわよ。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_560<tab>How fares the crafting effort, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Both the apprentices and I eagerly await your finished chronometer.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_560<tab>製作は順調でしょうか？
徒弟さんたちも、師範の「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F245F201 /var>」の完成を、
楽しみに待っております。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_570<tab>This, Schoolmaster, is absolutely flawless. My breath fairly caught in my throat. My expectations of you are high as a matter of course, but you manage to transcend them every time.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_570<tab>いつもながら、素晴らしいお手本をありがとうございます。
……思わず、溜息の出る仕上がりですね。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_571<tab>Apprentices, you are not like to find a finer example of a chronometer. Study it well and reproduce it as best you can, and you shall acquire the requisite knowledge and techniques for making an orchestrion.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_571<tab>徒弟さんたちは、まずはこちらの品を参考に、
クロノメーターを製作してください。
オーケストリオンを作る上で、勉強になることは多いはず。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_572<tab>We're supposed to reproduce <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>? Oh, dear, my hands are starting to shake, but it's not out of dread but the excitement of tackling the task! The more I learn goldsmithing, the more I'm made to appreciate the schoolmaster's brilliance and keenly feel how utterly unpolished I am next to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_572<tab>あれを、あたしたちが作るのかあ……武者震いがしてきたっす！
自分で彫金を学んでみると、ますます師範のすごさがわかります！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_573<tab>You're like a god among goldsmiths, up in your own place in the heavens while we're bumbling down here on the ground, and though we may never get to where you are, we'll keep on climbing every mountain in the hopes that one day we will!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_JKHEBICA_000_573<tab>……師範は本当に、彫金の神様っすね！
その域に少しでも近づけるよう、3人でがんばるっす！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_574<tab>'Tis well that they are motivated, for this will be the steepest mountain yet. But when they have climbed it, they will be all the more prepared to climb all the others to come.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD680_02602_EMELOTH_000_574<tab>徒弟さんたち、なかなかの成長ぶりですけれど……
まずは、クロノメーター製作でそれなりの成果が見られたら、
本格的なオーケストリオンに取り組んでもらいましょう。
